SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.annotation
Annotation Type Scope

@Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Scope

Indicates the scope, or lifecycle, of the annotated bean, such as prototype or singleton. This annotation is used in conjunction with Bean or Component.

If a scope is not provided, singleton is used by default.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0 07/11/12
Author:
Tyler Treat

Optional Element Summary
 java.lang.String value
          Declares the Bean scope.
 

value

public abstract java.lang.String value
Declares the Bean scope.

Returns:
the desired Bean scope
Default:
"singleton"
